pullrequest.title: Move windows install instructions to the tutorials.

content.raw:
(I am actually testing these instructions on Windows 8. Just letting you know as I run into problems.)

Chrome warned me about downloading zip files. Whenever it finishes download, it says "(name).zip is not commonly downloaded and could be dangerous" and shows a button that says "Discard". You have to click on the file and select "keep" for it not to get deleted. It seems to think the zip files are all malware.
content.html:
(I am actually testing these instructions on Windows 8. Just letting you know as I run into problems.)

Chrome warned me about downloading zip files. Whenever it finishes download, it says "(name).zip is not commonly downloaded and could be dangerous" and shows a button that says "Discard". You have to click on the file and select "keep" for it not to get deleted. It seems to think the zip files are all malware.
